1.text: The plane screams as it tears through the sky. A thunderous jolt, screaming metal, then darkness. You wake, alone. Flames devour the wreck. Everyone else is dead.

choices.text: Get out & run towards the jungle.

death_1.text: You crawl back toward the flaming fuselage, determined to find your phone. A low whine turns into a deafening roar — the engine explodes. Fire engulfs you in seconds. Game over.

2.text: You stumble into the jungle, branches clawing at your skin. Smoke and ash cling to your lungs. Something growls in the distance.

death_2.text: You slip on the mossy slope, tumbling down and snapping your neck on a jagged root. You don't even scream. Game over.

3.text: You crouch silently. A black jaguar passes nearby, its eyes gleaming. You wait until it vanishes.

death_3.text: The jaguar leaps from the shadows and sinks its teeth into your neck. Your world fades to black. Game over.

4.text: You find a narrow stream. The water is cold. A shiny object glints beneath the surface.

choices.text: Ignore it and follow the bank.

death_4.text: A venomous snake coils around your arm. Its fangs sink deep. You collapse, the poison spreading. Game over.

5.text: Further down, you see a collapsed bridge of rotting planks. The river roars below.

death_5.text: The planks give way under your weight. You plunge into the rocks below. Game over.

6.text: You find a ford upstream and wade across. Mud sucks at your boots.

death_6.text: The tracks lead into quicksand. You sink beneath the surface. Game over.

7.text: You spot an abandoned house by the riverbank, its windows dark.

death_7.text: As you wait, a pack of wild dogs emerges, ripping you apart. Game over.

8.text: Inside, the air is stale. A child's drawing on the wall stares back.

death_8.text: The drawing moves in your hands. A cold force slams you against the wall. Game over.

9.text: Upstairs, a dusty journal warns of spirits that roam at night.

death_9.text: You lie down; shadows envelop you, crushing your breath. Game over.

10.text: A whisper calls your name from outside. The journal says never answer.

death_10.text: You shout. Silence falls. Then a scream from within your mind. You collapse. Game over.

11.text: You slip out a back window into the moonlit garden. Vines twist around you.

death_11.text: The vines tighten, choking you slowly. Game over.

12.text: The path leads to a ritual circle of bones and feathers.

death_12.text: Ethereal hands drag you into the earth. Game over.

13.text: You emerge from the clearing to a dense fog that blurs your vision.

death_13.text: You wait; the fog suffocates you. Game over.

14.text: Your foot plunges into something cold and hard. It's a stone altar etched with runes.

death_14.text: A bolt of lightning strikes the altar, sending shards through your chest. Game over.

15.text: You find a narrow trench leading uphill.

death_15.text: The ground collapses beneath you, sending you into a pit of spikes. Game over.

16.text: At the top, you see a radio tower with blinking lights.

death_16.text: Night creatures descend on you. You are consumed alive. Game over.

17.text: You reach the top; the wind howls. You grab the antenna to steady yourself.

death_17.text: You slip, falling all the way down. Game over.

18.text: A crackling voice responds: 'Stay put, we're coming.' You see headlights below.

death_18.text: You jump; your ankle snaps. You crawl but bleed out. Game over.

19.text: Rescuers surround the tower, offering a rope.

death_19.text: You wait; the tower collapses from rot. You fall into darkness. Game over.

20.text: Safely on the ground, you stagger to a rescue vehicle.

choices.text: Inspect the jungle one last time.

death_20.text: A hidden beast lunges as you look back. It drags you into the forest. Game over.

21.text: Inside the vehicle, you see a map showing your location and nearest hospital.

death_21.text: On the drive home, you drift into unconsciousness and never wake. Game over.

22.text: At the hospital entrance, you collapse. Paramedics rush in.

death_22.text: You slip into a coma. You never emerge. Game over.

23.text: Your story makes headlines. You become a legend of survival.

death_23.text: In solitude, guilt consumes you. You vanish. Game over.

24.text: You write a book about The Green Veil. It becomes a bestseller.

death_24.text: You return and disappear without trace. Game over.

25.text: Your foundation saves lives. But at night, you still hear the jungle’s call.

death_25.text: You fly back and vanish in the canopy. Game over.

26.text: You dedicate your life to helping others survive nature’s horrors.

death_26.text: Your past guilt drags you under. Game over.

27.text: You release a documentary about the jungle’s spirits.

death_27.text: Overexposed, the spirits find you. Game over.

28.text: The local premiere brings closure to the villagers you saved.

death_28.text: Alone, the jungle’s memories consume you. Game over.

29.text: You stand on a stage, survivors cheering. You finally feel peace.

death_29.text: You vanish backstage, swallowed by shadows. Game over.

30.text: You survived. Your tale will warn and inspire generations to come.
